title: Eddie's Son Has Broken iPad Drama At School + Is Lunchbox Going To Space?! + What Should Bobby Name His Signature Wedding Drink?
itunes:title: Eddie's Son Has Broken iPad Drama At School + Is Lunchbox Going To Space?! + What Should Bobby Name His Signature Wedding Drink?
description:
Eddie’s son let one of the other kids borrow his iPad and that kid dropped it and it broke the screen. We determine what happened next! The results are in…did Lunchbox get chosen to go space and be a part of the first ever all civilian crew? Bobby shares a wedding update and that he’s trying to create the name for his signature cocktail at the wedding. Call us with your idea! 877-77-BOBBY

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
